name: image-gram
description: route get'/' login atau register get'/sign-up' register account post'/sign-up' register account get'/user' menampilkan semua post get'/user/profile' menampilkan halaman profile get'/user/profile/edit' halaman edit post'/user/profile/edit' memasukkan hasil edit ke database get'/user/post/add' menampilkan add form untuk post post'/user/post/add' memasukkan data ke database get'/user/post/delete' menghapus post get'/user/post/likes' menambah like
